<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Miracle Worker](/Feats.aspx?ID=125) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemist" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=7" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 81 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once every 10 minutes

</column>

---

Your alchemical mastery can resuscitate the recently slain. You can administer a [true elixir of life](/Equipment.aspx?ID=91) to a creature who has been dead for no more than 2 rounds. When you do, that creature is immediately returned to life with 1 Hit Point and becomes wounded 1.
